remarks: Any closed set is saturated with respect to the topological indistinguishability map (in the terminology of ~ qtoprest ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
kqval.2 $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> { y e. J | x e. y } ) $.
kqcldsat $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> ( `' F " ( F " U ) ) = U ) $.
$d J x y $.
$d X x y $.
